scripts.transpile-source: node scripts/watch-es6.js lib/ null once & node scripts/watch-scss.js lib/ null once
scripts.transpile-examples: npm run transpile-examples-css && npm run transpile-examples-js
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile-source && npm run transpile-examples
scripts.build-examples: npm run transpile-examples && node scripts/build-examples.js examples
scripts.watch-examples: npm run watch-examples-es6 & npm run watch-examples-css
scripts.watch-source-css: node scripts/watch-scss.js lib/ null null copy-libs
scripts.watch-source-es6: node scripts/watch-es6.js lib/ null null copy-libs
scripts.watch-source: npm run watch-source-css & npm run watch-source-es6
scripts.watch: npm run watch-source & npm run watch-examples
scripts.github: rimraf ../gh-pages/app && rimraf ../gh-pages/*.html && rimraf ../gh-pages/lib && rimraf ../gh-pages/config.js && npm run transpile && npm run build-examples && npm run copy-to-gh
